titleStmt.title: Minutes of the TEI Technical Council
titleStmt.meeting: TEI Technical Council online meeting : 26 June 2017

sourceDesc.p: Retagged from a WordPress HTML file

revisionDesc.change: Extracted from Word Press article with id post-29034

list.item: Syd Bauman (who needs to leave @ 13:40, anyway)

Release 3.2.0
SB & SS are the release technicians
IRC Information
Possible issue with IRCâ€”may not be available through your institution/ may need a web client.
Should we switch to Slack? We could record history here (have to set a preference in order to record IRC history)
HC Suggests Slack since that is cool and shiny.

Timeline:
Refrigeration starts: Mon 06-26 (typos, prose changes, small issues)
Freeze starts: Mon 07-03
Release day: Mon 07-10

TEIC/TEIÂ Milestone Issues
1552Â : MS encouraged to make green an implement
1651Â : JC notes that this one is done, just leaving open for related Stylesheets change that should be done as well. Council recommends closing, so he does.
379Â : EB notes that this one needs some careful writing; think we can do it for this release, want help. EM will draft wording for review.
PS wants to finishÂ 1441Â . Almost done â€¦

Other business?
EM discusses some of the problems w/ managing TEI-L
bots asking permission to join is very common
When we get a spam post (usually of the nature of â€œcome read my blogâ€), it causes a small flurry of unsubscribes. These are probably list members who arenâ€™t very involved anyway.
So far EM doesnâ€™t see a real problem in handling subscribe request
Please notify EM or SB quickly if you notice spam on any of the TEI lists.
JC Notes quick ticket solving:Â https://github.com/TEIC/TEI/issues/1660Â Just over 30 minutes ğŸ˜‰
